datadog_integration_aws.description: Provides a Datadog - Amazon Web Services integration resource. This can be used to create and manage the integrations.

account_id.description: Your AWS Account ID without dashes.

filter_tags.description: Array of EC2 tags (in the form `key:value`

host_tags.description: Array of tags (in the form key:value

account_specific_namespace_rules.description: Enables or disables metric collection for specific AWS namespaces for this AWS account only. A list of namespaces can be found at the [available namespace rules API endpoint](https://docs.datadoghq.com/api/?lang=bash#list-namespace-rules).
